mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERV (reserv_no, member_id, program_no, reserv_total_count, child_count, adult_count, reserv_total_price, reserv_date, reserv_cancle, reserv_exprt) VALUES (reserv_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{programNo}, #{adultCount} + #{childCount}, #{childCount}, #{adultCount}, #{reservTotalPrice}, #{reservDate}, #{reservCancle}, #{reservExprt})
